page.title: 04Churches on our patch
page.content:
There are two churches on our Domesday patch,Stepaside Chapel in Mochdre and the Pentecostal church, down in the
valley.Fifty years ago there were many more members at the chapel;today about twenty attend.The denomination is Wesleyan. Built in 1976 the Pentecostal church can hold 400 people and some 200 attend regularily.The collection is often more than Â£500.Three mini-buses are used for trips and there are ten classes in the Sunday school.As well as the organ,the church has a synthesiser,violins,guitars and drums.The church is used during the week by a number of groups;the playschool is very popular,with thirty attending.
